name: SmartTraveller
0:
”Alexa ask smart traveller to suggest a holiday for July”
”Suggest a destination for August”
”January vacation”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart traveller
des: Smart Traveller is designed to help people travel smarter, by suggesting travel destinations around the planet to them according to the month they wish to travel.All they have to do is let Alexa know of the month they wish to holiday and Alexa will suggest a travel destination that could fit their travel plans.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
